dcterms:creator: T. Harinen
A. Filipowicz
S. Hakimi
R. Iliev
M. Klenk
E. Sumner
dcterms:description: A dataset collected from a study asking 500 drivers in the United States for demographic information and their top barriers to adopting Battery Electric Vehicles (BEVs). The barriers were coded into a set based on responses, with a focus on identifying factors influencing BEV adoption.
dcterms:title: Barriers Dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Harinen
A. Filipowicz
S. Hakimi
R. Iliev
M. Klenk
E. Sumner
dcterms:description: A dataset collected from a survey conducted on MTurk, involving 4136 subjects who provided demographic information and their preferences for Battery Electric Vehicles (BEVs) after being exposed to various interventions.
dcterms:title: Survey Dataset (from MTurk)
